languages.text: {n}Глаза Мейв что две луны — светятся восторгом и любопытством. Она прикусывает губу в явных попытках сдержаться и не завалить вас уймой новых вопросов.{/n} "Простите, вы... что-то хотели спросить?"
languages.translation_comment: в конце куя Шут кланяется, исчезает

traits.locale_text: "Вот это да! Хотелось бы и мне — когда-нибудь, хоть на чуточку..." {n}Глаза Лидзи что две луны — светятся восторгом и любопытством. Она прикусывает губу в явных попытках сдержаться и не завалить вас уймой новых вопросов.{/n} "Простите, вы... что-то хотели спросить?"

languages.translation_comment: в конце куя Шут кланяется, исчезает

languages.text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Мейв что две луны — светятся восторгом и любопытством. Она прикусывает губу в явных попытках сдержаться и не завалить вас уймой новых вопросов.{/n} "Простите, вы... что-то хотели спросить?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me, did you... wish to ask something?"

{n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not bombard you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

"Wow! I wish I could too... one day, if only for a moment..." {n}Lidzy's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me, did you... wish to ask something?"

{n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not bombard you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

languages.text: {n}梅芙的眼睛瞪得像满月一样圆，闪烁着惊异与好奇的目光。她咬着嘴唇，显然是在努力克制着自己的好奇心，不敢再用更多的问题打扰你。{/n}“请原谅，您……是有事情要问我吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙的眼睛瞪得像满月一样圆，闪烁着惊异与好奇的目光。她咬着嘴唇，显然是在努力克制着自己的好奇心，不敢再用更多的问题打扰你。{/n}“请原谅，您……是有事情要问我吗？”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Maive son como dos lunas brillantes que irradian curiosidad y fascinación. Se muerde el labio en un intento evidente de contenerse para no acribillarte a preguntas.{/n} «Discúlpeme. ¿Quería... preguntarme alguna cosa?».
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Maive son como dos lunas brillantes que irradian curiosidad y fascinación. Se muerde el labio en un intento evidente de contenerse para no acribillarte a preguntas.{/n} «Discúlpeme. ¿Quería... preguntarme alguna cosa?».

languages.text: {n}Maive'in gözleri merak ve hayretle parlayan iki ay gibi parıldıyor. Kendini tutmak ve seni daha fazla soru yağmuruna tutmamak için bariz bir çabayla dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Affedin beni. Bana... Bir şey sormak mı istemiştiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive'in gözleri merak ve hayretle parlayan iki ay gibi parıldıyor. Kendini tutmak ve seni daha fazla soru yağmuruna tutmamak için bariz bir çabayla dudağını ısırıyor.{/n} "Affedin beni. Bana... Bir şey sormak mı istemiştiniz?"

languages.text: {n}メイヴは目を丸くして、驚きと好奇心で輝く。彼女は唇を噛み、明らかに我慢しようと試みており、さらに質問しないようにしている。{/n}「失礼しました。私に何かお尋ねですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは目を丸くして、驚きと好奇心で輝く。彼女は唇を噛み、明らかに我慢しようと試みており、さらに質問しないようにしている。{/n}「失礼しました。私に何かお尋ねですか？」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Maive sont comme deux lunes, brillants d'émerveillement et de curiosité. Elle se mord la lèvre dans une tentative évidente de se retenir de vous poser d'autres questions.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Aviez-vous... quelque chose à me demander ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Maive sont comme deux lunes, brillants d'émerveillement et de curiosité. Elle se mord la lèvre dans une tentative évidente de se retenir de vous poser d'autres questions.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Aviez-vous... quelque chose à me demander ? »

languages.text: {n}Maives Augen gleichen zwei Monden, die fasziniert und neugierig glänzen. Sie beißt sich auf die Lippen, um sich zu zügeln und dir nicht noch mehr Fragen zu stellen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir. Wolltet Ihr ... mich etwas fragen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Maive's eyes are like two moons, shining with wonder and curiosity. She bites her lip in an obvious attempt to restrain herself and not pepper you with more questions.{/n} "Pardon me. Did you... wish to ask me something?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maives Augen gleichen zwei Monden, die fasziniert und neugierig glänzen. Sie beißt sich auf die Lippen, um sich zu zügeln und dir nicht noch mehr Fragen zu stellen.{/n} "Verzeiht mir. Wolltet Ihr ... mich etwas fragen?"
